flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • empty box
  • Piece of coroplast or cardboard
Tools
  • Decorative scissors, scalloped-edge rotary cutter, and/or hole punch
  • Drill
  • Measuring tape/ruler

lines.text: Start with an empty box that is large enough to hold your stationery.
lines.text_raw: Start with an empty box that is large enough to hold your stationery.

lines.text: Measure the length, breadth and depth of the inner box.
lines.text_raw: Measure the length, breadth and depth of the inner box.

lines.text: Take a plastic coroplast sheet and cut out a piece whose width is equal to the depth of the box, and whose length is equal to the length plus the width of the box.
lines.text_raw: Take a plastic coroplast sheet and cut out a piece whose width is equal to the depth of the box, and whose length is equal to the length plus the width of the box.

lines.text: Fold it into a bracket shape and insert it into the box as shown in photo 2.
lines.text_raw: Fold it into a bracket shape and insert it into the box as shown in photo 2.

lines.text: You will reassemble the box when the project is finished.
lines.text_raw: You will reassemble the box when the project is finished.

lines.text: Take the outer box and make marks on the top every 20mm.
lines.text_raw: Take the outer box and make marks on the top every 20mm.

lines.text: Smooth the holes with scissors or a pen.
lines.text_raw: Smooth the holes with scissors or a pen.

lines.text: Insert your pens and pencils into the holes.
lines.text_raw: Insert your pens and pencils into the holes.

lines.text: Put some writing paper into the box, reassemble it and enjoy your stationery holder.
lines.text_raw: Put some writing paper into the box, reassemble it and enjoy your stationery holder.

guide.summary: Recycle a box(iPhone 4s box) to hold your stationery.
guide.title: iStationery Holder

tools.text: Decorative scissors, scalloped-edge rotary cutter, and/or hole punch
